name: olio.llm.contextRef

fields.name: refSchema
fields.description: Model schema of the referenced object (e.g. data.data, data.tag, olio.charPerson).

fields.name: objectId

fields.name: name

fields.name: summarizing
fields.description: True when an auto-summarize operation is in progress for this reference.
